statements: SELECT * FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'predation';
SELECT species_one, species_two FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'mutualism';
SELECT interaction_description FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE interaction_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE species_one = 'Lion';
SELECT * FROM EcologicalInteractions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE species_one = 'Lion' AND species_two = 'Zebra';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Predation';
SELECT interaction_id, species_one, species_two FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Mutualism' ORDER BY species_one, species_two DESC;
SELECT interaction_description FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE species_one LIKE '%Plant%' OR species_two LIKE '%Plant%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM EcologicalInteractions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING total_interactions > 3;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM Species WHERE diet = 'Omnivore';
SELECT species_name, diet FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE habitat = 'Jungle' AND diet = 'Carnivore';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Predation';
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM Species WHERE diet = 'Carnivore'
SELECT species_name, habitat, diet FROM Species WHERE habitat = 'Forest'
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM Interactions WHERE species_1_id = 1
SELECT species_name, habitat, diet FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT species_name, habitat, diet FROM Species WHERE habitat LIKE '%water%'
SELECT * FROM ecological_interactions;
SELECT id, species_1, species_2 FROM ecological_interactions WHERE interaction_type='predation';
SELECT species_name, adaptation_type, adaptation_description FROM species_adaptations WHERE adaptation_type='mimicry';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitat_information ORDER BY habitat_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecological_interactions WHERE species_1='Lion' AND interaction_type='predation';
SELECT * FROM ecological_interactions WHERE species_1 = 'Lion';
SELECT species_1, species_2, interaction_type FROM ecological_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Predation' ORDER BY species_1 ASC;
SELECT * FROM species_adaptations WHERE adaptation_type = 'Camouflage' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, adaptation_description FROM species_adaptations WHERE adaptation_description LIKE '%cold%' OR adaptation_description LIKE '%hot%' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM habitat_information WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' AND habitat_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY habitat_name;
SELECT * FROM EcologicalInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'predation';
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM Species WHERE species_category = 'Mammal';
SELECT adaptation_id, adaptation_type FROM SpeciesAdaptations ORDER BY adaptation_type DESC;
SELECT history_id, timestamp, observation_notes FROM EcologicalInteractionsHistory WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM EcologicalInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'predation';
SELECT history_id, timestamp, interaction_result FROM EcologicalInteractionsHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT adaptation_type, adaptation_description FROM SpeciesAdaptations WHERE adaptation_type LIKE '%behavior%' AND adaptation_description ILIKE '%social%';
SELECT * FROM species LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT interaction_type, species1_name, species2_name FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Predator-Prey';
SELECT habitat_type, location, temperature_celsius FROM habitats WHERE temperature_celsius > 25;
SELECT observation_date, species_name FROM ecological_data JOIN species ON ecological_data.species_id = species.species_id ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type, population_size FROM species;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'predation';
SELECT species_name, habitat_type, location FROM species JOIN habitats ON species.habitat_type = habitats.habitat_type;
SELECT adaptations.trait_description, species.species_name FROM adaptations JOIN species ON adaptations.species_id = species.species_id;

SELECT interactions.interaction_id, species1_name, species2_name, interaction_type, observation_date FROM interactions JOIN ecological_data ON interactions.interaction_id = ecological_data.interaction_id;
